graph_title: Number of training courses per year
indicator_name: Proportion of children aged 24-59 months who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex
source_organisation_1: Senatsverwaltung für Bildung, Jugend und Familie - Regionale Fortbildung Berlin
target_name: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre‐primary education so that they are ready for primary education
page_content: The indicator shows the training offered to the pedagogical staff at Berlin schools in the area of "Education for Sustainable Development (ESD)". The offers apply to all districts.
